CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 9 reads: "Guests Of Squaws - Among the out-of-town guests at the Squaws' "Cotton Extravaganza" at the Hilton Hotel last Thursday night was the above group. Left to right, seated :Mrs. Minnie McClain, Mrs. Henry Crowder and Mrs. Geneva Brown, all of Washington, D.C., and Mrs. Lucille Allen of Cleveland, Ohio.  Standing :Mr. and Mrs. Richard Fingler of Saskatchewan, Canada; Howard Johnson, Rockymount, Va.; Mrs. A.E. Guardeau, Jacksonville, Fla.; Henry Crowder, Washington, D.C.; Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Lyons, Inkster, Mich.; T.S. McClain, Washington, D.C.; Mrs. Dorothy Wilson, New York, and Rufus Allen, Cleveland, Ohio."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated, from left: Minnie McClain, Mrs. Henry Crowder, Geneva Brown, and Lucille Allen; standing: Mr. and Mrs. Richard Fingler, Howard Johnson, Mrs. A.E. Guardeau, Henry Crowder, Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Lyons, T.S. McClain, Dorothy Wilson, and Rufus Allen, posed in Hilton Hotel for Squaw Club's "Cotton Extravaganza"
